mapper.select: SELECT jc.cart_id , jc.consumer_id , jg.goods_name , jc.amount , jg.sale_price , jg.origin_price , atc.uuid , atc.filename1 , atc.uploadpath FROM jollygoods AS jg LEFT OUTER JOIN jolly_cart AS jc ON jg.goods_name = jc.goods_name LEFT OUTER JOIN attach AS atc ON atc.attach_name = jc.goods_name WHERE jc.consumer_id = #{consumerId} AND atc.main = 'O';
